resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107340</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107340</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bethlehem, Pennsylvania: A Moravian Settlement in Colonial America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bethlehem, Pennsylvania: Eine Moravian 
Regelung in Kolonialamerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bethlehem, Pennsylvanie : Un règlement de 
Moravian en Amérique coloniale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bethlehem, Pensilvânia: Um estabelecimento 
de Moravian em América colonial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bethlehem, Pensilvania: Uno stabilimento di 
Moravian in America coloniale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βηθλεέμ, Πενσυλβανία: Μια τακτοποίηση Moravian
στην αποικιακή Αμερική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bethlehem, Pennsylvania: Un establecimiento 
de Moravian en América colonial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at this area (along the Lehigh River) that became the center of industry and community for Moravians, a Protestant group that migrated to colonial America seeking opportunity and the chance to spread their religious beliefs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">betrachtet diesen Bereich (entlang dem Lehigh 
Fluß) der die Mitte der Industrie und der Gemeinschaft für 
Moravians, eine protestierende Gruppe wurde, die zur Kolonialamerika 
suchenden Gelegenheit und zur Wahrscheinlichkeit, ihren frommen 
Glauben zu verbreiten fortzog.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regarde cette zone (le long du fleuve de Lehigh) 
qui est devenue le centre de l'industrie et de la communauté pour 
Moravians, un groupe protestant qui a passé à l'occasion 
recherchante coloniale de l'Amérique et à la chance d'écarter leur 
croyance religieuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olha esta área (ao longo do rio de Lehigh) que se
transformou o centro da indústria e da comunidade para Moravians, um 
grupo protestant que migrasse à oportunidade procurando colonial de 
América e à possibilidade de espalhar sua opinião religiosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">guarda questa zona (lungo il fiume di Lehigh) che 
si è transformata in nel centro di industria e di Comunità per 
Moravians, un gruppo protestante che ha migrato all'occasione di 
ricerca coloniale dell'America ed alla probabilità spargere la loro 
credenza religiosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει αυτήν την περιοχή (κατά μήκος του ποταμού 
Lehigh) που έγινε το κέντρο της βιομηχανίας και της κοινότητας 
για Moravians, μια προτεσταντική ομάδα που μετανάστευσε στην 
αποικιακή Αμερική που επιδιώκει την ευκαιρία και την πιθανότητα 
να διαδώσει τις θρησκευτικές πεποιθήσεις τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mira esta área (a lo largo del río de Lehigh) 
que se convirtió en el centro de la industria y de la comunidad para 
Moravians, grupo protestante que emigró a la oportunidad que buscaba 
colonial de América y a la ocasión de separar su creencia religiosa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107340</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bethlehem-pennsylvania-a-moravian-settlement-in-colonial-america</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
